{{cpp/chrono/zoned_time/title|get_time_zone}}
{{cpp/chrono/zoned_time/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|
TimeZonePtr get_time_zone() const;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Retrieves the stored time zone pointer.

===Return value===
A copy of the stored time zone pointer.

===Notes===
There's no way to access the time zone pointer when {{tt|TimeZonePtr}} is a move-only type.
